ygData.subject: Re: Different color ROBES, and how to get them....
ygData.msgSnippet: Aye, I ran into the same problem, Tandayen.  I don t think another player can loot a robe of your dead carcass. Valacian - 18th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony
ygData.messageBody:
Aye, I ran into the same problem, Tandayen. I don't think another player can loot a robe of your dead carcass.

Valacian - 18th Level Erudite Wizard, Xegony

-----Original Message-----
From: Chris Trubiani [SMTP:u1607755@...]
Sent: Thursday, April 22, 1999 2:57 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Re: Different color ROBES, and how to get them....

From: "Chris Trubiani" <u1607755@...>

Are you sure about that? You've done it before? I died once a long way
from home, and consented someone to loot my body and bring my stuff back.
He was able to take everything except my robe. No matter how many times he
dragged it over to his inventory it stayed on my body.

Tandayen, Dark Elf Wizard


-----Original Message-----
From: McCartney, Michael R <Michael.McCartney2@...>
To: 'eq_wizards@onelist.com' <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, April 22, 1999 4:45 PM
Subject: [eq_wizards] Different color ROBES, and how to get them....


>From: "McCartney, Michael R" <Michael.McCartney2@...>
>
>because of all the messages I'm gettin about how to get them, I've decided
to post it...
>
>/consent Yep. Thats how. If you die.. and you consent someone else to
retrieve your belongings.. they can take your robe. Then, they cant give it
back to you.
>
>EXAMPLE: You want that black robe from Neriak.. problem is.. you're a
High Elf. You travel into Neriak.. just near the zone.. do a /who all and
find a wizard in there... start telling people to help you out. Heres the
deal... your "friend" the dark elf has to go buy it. Whether you give him
money or whatever is inconsequential. He gets the robe, and goes to meet
you. He has to die. After he dies, he /consent s you to retrieve things
off of his corpse. You take the robe. Now you've got it. If you try to
give it back to him, you'll get the error message "This item cannot be
dropped, traded, or sold." but its yours now.
>
>Hope that helps.
>
>Let me know if there are any questions.
>
>Drev
>
